duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical trouble shooting support for designated client business and delivery of chemicals.
Collect field samples for on-going monitoring and analysis.
Manage internal resources to support business operations.
Coordinate with workers, engineers, designers, and technicians.
Perform inventory management and ensure compliance with specifications.
Operate a ¾ or 1 ton pickup with trailer and maintain truck and equipment.
Load trailers and schedule daily runs to meet customer delivery requirements.
Maintain delivery location maps and operate in accordance with DOT regulations.
Complete work tickets for jobs and report field problems and safety hazards.
Wear appropriate safety gear and keep current on safety techniques.
Complete required safety and equipment related trainings on a monthly basis.
Answer company issued cell phone during on-call hours.

education_certification.credential: High School or GED equivalent.Must be at least 21 years of age.Must have at least one (1) year of previous DOT driving experience.Must be able to communicate effectively with co-workers, customers, clients and management.Requires a strong sense of direction and knowledge of surrounding areas.Must be able to use hand tools.Must be able to drive long distances in company vehicle.Must be able to lift a minimum of 50 lbs.
